name: Create new Bannerbear images from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically create a new image in Bannerbear. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1rfmN1VIjJIawhwIxLqoKxfSikwVrrkUM6XV3ynBc5Gs/edit?usp=sharing).
